title: So It Goes...
lyrics: See you in the dark<BREAKER>All eyes on you, my magician<BREAKER>All eyes on us<BREAKER>You make everyone disappear, and<BREAKER>Cut me into pieces<BREAKER>Gold cage, hostage to my feelings<BREAKER>Back against the wall<BREAKER>Trippin', trip-trippin' when you're gone
'Cause we breakdown a little<BREAKER>But when you get me alone, it's so simple<BREAKER>'Cause baby, I know what you know<BREAKER>We can feel it

And all the pieces fall<BREAKER>Right into place<BREAKER>Getting caught up in a moment<BREAKER>Lipstick on your face<BREAKER>So it goes<BREAKER>I'm yours to keep<BREAKER>And I'm yours to lose<BREAKER>You know I'm not a bad girl<BREAKER>But I do bad things with you<BREAKER>So it goes

Met you in a bar<BREAKER>All eyes on me, your illusionist<BREAKER>All eyes on us<BREAKER>I make all your gray days clear and<BREAKER>Wear you like a necklace<BREAKER>I'm so chill, but you make me jealous<BREAKER>But I got your heart<BREAKER>Skippin', skip-skippin' when I'm gone
'Cause we breakdown a little<BREAKER>But when I get you alone, it's so simple<BREAKER>'Cause baby, I know what you know<BREAKER>We can feel it

And all the pieces fall<BREAKER>Right into place<BREAKER>Getting caught up in a moment<BREAKER>Lipstick on your face<BREAKER>So it goes<BREAKER>I'm yours to keep<BREAKER>And I'm yours to lose<BREAKER>You know I'm not a bad girl<BREAKER>But I do bad things with you<BREAKER>So it goes
Come here, dressed in black now<BREAKER>So, so, so it goes<BREAKER>Scratches down your back now<BREAKER>So, so, so it goes

You did a number on me<BREAKER>But honestly, baby, who's counting?<BREAKER>I did a number on you<BREAKER>But honestly, baby, who's counting?<BREAKER>You did a number on me<BREAKER>But honestly, baby, who's counting?<BREAKER>Who's counting?<BREAKER>(One, two, three)

And all the pieces fall<BREAKER>Right into place<BREAKER>Getting caught up in a moment<BREAKER>Lipstick on your face<BREAKER>So it goes<BREAKER>I'm yours to keep<BREAKER>And I'm yours to lose<BREAKER>You know I'm not a bad girl<BREAKER>But I do bad things with you<BREAKER>So it goes

Come here, dressed in black now<BREAKER>So, so, so it goes<BREAKER>Scratches down your back now<BREAKER>So, so, so it goes<BREAKER>Come here, dressed in black now<BREAKER>So, so, so it goes<BREAKER>Scratches down your back now<BREAKER>So, so, so it goes
